      Methods in location that return types with arguments of type Location 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,Location> Location.getAdjacent()
      Returns all of the adjacent locations which can be moved to from this location.
      Methods in location with parameters of type Location 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Location.addAdjacent(java.lang.String dir, Location adj)
      Adds an adjacent location, which means people can move to that location from this one.
